description:
Try to add this with 'Supercalc' : 9.99+11.99+249.99+3.99+9.99+3.88+2.89+22.99
You will get :
315.71000000000004
If it can not add this correctly, can you trust the rest?
summary: Can not do simple math - like addition

description:
Yeah, it can't do right math with this example 9.99+11.99+249.99+3.99+9.99+3.88+2.89+22.99. 
I confirm that it's not only this program issue. I tried to do it in python and it gives the same strange result.

did you tried to calculate 9.99+11.99+249.99+3.99+9.99+3.88+2.89+22.99 on google's calculator ??? 

the result is 315.71 and supercalc also gives you 315.71000000000004. which rounds 315.71.

i dont know what's not right here ?
summary: This reply yo Jeff Benjamin's review about wrong calculation
